sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Forensic Psychiatry Fellowship Training Act.

sections.heading: Creation of program. sections.text: Creation of program. The University of Illinois at Chicago and Southern Illinois University shall expand their focuses on enrolling, training, and graduating forensic mental health professionals by each creating, subject to appropriations, a forensic psychiatry fellowship training program at their Colleges of Medicine.

sections.heading: Powers and duties under program
sections.text: Under the forensic psychiatry fellowship training program created under Section 5 of this Act, the University of Illinois at Chicago and Southern Illinois University shall each have all of the following powers and duties:

sections.heading: Program curriculum.   The curriculum for the forensic psychiatry fellowship training program created under Section 5 of this Act shall be developed in accordance with criteria established by the Residency Review Committee of the Accreditation Council for Graduate Medical Education (ACGME)
sections.text: Program curriculum.
